attributes.action: Give option of removing addresses from Companies House if it's a home address.
attributes.additional_details: Having the home address of someone readily available online compromises the safety of business founders (particularly females and marginalized groups). I have spoken to many founders who have experienced inappropriate messages and obscene calls and feel that having their home address readily available online is causing them stress.
attributes.background: I would like Self-Employed people and Limited Companies the option of removing an address from Companies House if it's their home address. Currently you can add an accountants address which can come at a cost and people can still find the home address you originally registered with if they want to.

rejection.details:
You can request that Companies House remove your address from the public register here:
https://www.gov.uk/stop-companies-house-from-publishing-your-address
